title: Geometric modern - Tried multiple searches, Liberator seemed to be the closest but not as elegant.
author: gorankrst

comments.content:
Had no luck finding a match, either.

Government Issue is a closer than Liberator:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/government-issue/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141028211725/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/government-issue/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/government-issue/")
It is either Blender or Gridnik modified.

I think Gridnik is more likely—I looked at Blender initially ( [http://www.typophile.com/node/120544](http://web.archive.org/web/20141028211725/http:/www.typophile.com/node/120544 "http://www.typophile.com/node/120544")), but thought the joints weren't sharp enough.
